subdisciplines.name: Data modeling
subdisciplines.description: The process of creating a detailed data model of a database.

subdisciplines.name: Database design
subdisciplines.description: The process of designing a database, including its schema, structure, and relationships.

subdisciplines.name: Database administration
subdisciplines.description: The management and maintenance of a database, including backup and recovery, security, and performance tuning.

subdisciplines.name: Data warehousing
subdisciplines.description: The process of collecting, managing, and analyzing large amounts of data from different sources to support business intelligence

subdisciplines.name: Data mining
subdisciplines.description: The process of discovering patterns and relationships in large amounts of data using machine learning and statistical methods.
